transcript.text: It\u2019s time for: Food Adventure Program for Awesome People!
The Japanese Candy Edition!
Simon and Martina come play in Japan!
Simon: We got a special care package from a YouTube creator in Japan
You can click on here to check out the channel
And they gave us a whole bunch of awesome stuff
for us to try for for our Food Adventure Program
S: You can see we got some YouTube candy and YouTube candy
Martina: I wanna do Kai Bai Boh to see which one we\u2019re gonna try first
S: Okay. You know I\u2019m gonna win
M: No you\u2019re not
Okay, Kai Bai Boh
S: Good. So I\u2019m opening mine first
I have no idea what this is
It looks like, little like soft pockets on the back
M: I think it\u2019s a cola bottle or something
I\u2019ve touched it and I have a feeling
the psychic connection is that this is some kind of cotton candy
That\u2019s my feelings for it
S: Okay so let\u2019s see what this is
I didn\u2019t actually open this right
M: Guys my nose is so stuffy
I sound awful
I sound like I\u2019m in a cave
Can you hear it? Listen
S: Umm, is this candy or is this a sponge?
M: Umm, are we supposed to eat that?
S: It smells like coke
M: I can\u2019t smell anything
S: Not like, the drug, but like, the cola
M: Not that I\u2019d know what it smells like
How do you smell the smell of coke?
You smell it and it goes up your nose and then you\u2019re like
S: That\u2019s how it works usually, that\u2019s how I saw it in the movies
M: What if I can\u2019t taste anything properly because my nose is so stuffy?
S: Oh my god, this is,
Ok take your piece
M: Okay ready? Jjang
S: Whoa, this is wonderful!
It\u2019s really sour but it\u2019s like cotton candy but coke!
M: Do you see those tiny, like little,
I don\u2019t know if you guys can see this,
we have a tiny little nibbiley hoobodehoohoos
S: Let\u2019s open up our second thing
S: Ok, the second one, also YouTube, ooooh
M: YouTube makes the greatest candy!
S: Wow, amazing!
Oooh it\u2019s one of those fishy bean cake things
M: Ok but we have these - is it upside down?
S: I don\u2019t think so
Fish are never upside down
M: What! If they\u2019re upside down they\u2019re dead!
S: That\u2019s true
M: It\u2019s gone
S: I guess we can eat it now
M: I think this is chocolate
You know how everything in Korea looks like chocolate
and then it\u2019s bean paste?
S: Ok, I don\u2019t think this is gonna be bean, I think it\u2019s gonna be chocolate
M: I think we have to do like a love bite
S: You think so?
M: Like, half and half together
You ready? Ok, 3, 2, 1
M: Oh god, Simon, you\u2019re covered in stuff
S: That\u2019s chocolate
M: Ok you are just like covered in stuff
I\u2019m gonna get some napkins. Simon\u2019s like, filthy
S: Take care of me ducky~
M: Oh my god you\u2019re so messy
S: This is incredibly difficult to eat without making a mess of yourself
*girly scream*
M: Simon, you better not eat all the food -
NOBODY BITES MY HUSBAND BUT ME!!
MARTINA BEAR TRANSFORMATION!!
Oh my god, where? Where?
Ah Noooo~~!!!
Mordney: Ah, vampire brother! Wait, wait!
Do you know where I could find UKiss?
Oh, thank you, thank you, I will go. Thank you!
Select Next Story
